channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Just as the Scions start coming into their own, harnessing their potential as a team, all their hard-won progress comes to a halt when they attempt the ultimate Scion ability: Fusion. The unexpected outcome endangers both Carter and Myridell while giving Graven another strategic advantage.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Kenzie helps Pete make a difficult decision. The Brawl?s love theme gets in the way of Heath and Daisy fixing their friendship, and Michelle turns to Eldon for Brawl advice.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: Legend of the Boneknapper Dragon
channel.desc: Animated short. When Gobber's house burns down, the old Viking is convinced that his nemesis, the legendary Boneknapper dragon, is responsible. Bent on revenge, Gobber resolves to hunt it down once and for all, despite the fact that no one believes the dragon exists. Regardless, Hiccup and the gang decide to accompany him for his own good. On the sea voyage, Gobber tells the story of his rivalry with the beast, which gets sillier with each episode. When the gang find themselves shipwrecked on the suspected island of the beast, they finally learn the truth about the dragon.
